name: Born To Jump
description:
Pitch :

In this game embody a crazy old man on the most Xtreme experience of his life : To Jump from a tower and try to pass through cibles during his free fall!

==============================================

Controls:

  • Move character: W/A/S/D or Arrows
  • Control character’s members: Left click + mouse vertical drag

==============================================

Technology:

  • Unity
  • MagicaVoxel
  • Adobe Audition
  • Adobe Photoshop

==============================================

Team:

Justin Nony

Maxime Bougnoux

Kristofer Tatéossian

Etienne Lagarde

GiGiChef (Music)

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 42. Please vote for us:
